verses.verse: In those days <S%H3117><s%> was Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%> sick <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto death <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8800><s%>. Then he turned <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> to the wall <S%H7023><s%>, and prayed <S%H6419><s%> <S%H8691><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

I beseech <S%H577><s%> thee, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8798><s%> now how I have walked <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8694><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee in truth <S%H571><s%> and with a perfect <S%H8003><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%>, and have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that which is good <S%H2896><s%> in thy sight <S%H5869><s%>. And it came to pass, afore Yesha`yah-yahu <S%H3470><s%> was gone out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into the middle <S%H8484><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H5892><s%>, that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came to him, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Turn again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and tell <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%> the captain <S%H5057><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%>, I have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy prayer <S%H8605><s%>, I have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy tears <S%H1832><s%>: behold, I will heal <S%H7495><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee: on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And I will add <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8689><s%> unto thy days <S%H3117><s%> fifteen <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>; and I will deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee and this city <S%H5892><s%> out of the hand <S%H3709><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ashur <S%H804><s%>; and I will defend <S%H1598><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this city <S%H5892><s%> for mine own sake, and for my servant <S%H5650><s%> David's <S%H1732><s%> sake.

And Yesha`yah-yahu <S%H3470><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> a lump <S%H1690><s%> of figs <S%H8384><s%>. And they took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and laid <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it on the boil <S%H7822><s%>, and he recovered <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Yesha`yah-yahu <S%H3470><s%>, What shall be the sign <S%H226><s%> that the YY <S%H3068><s%> will heal <S%H7495><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me, and that I shall go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> ?

And Yesha`yah-yahu <S%H3470><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, This sign <S%H226><s%> shalt thou have of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, that the YY <S%H3068><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the thing <S%H1697><s%> that he hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%>: shall the shadow <S%H6738><s%> go forward <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> degrees <S%H4609><s%>, or go back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> degrees <S%H4609><s%> ?

And Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H3169><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, It is a light thing <S%H7043><s%> <S%H8738><s%> for the shadow <S%H6738><s%> to go down <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8800><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> degrees <S%H4609><s%>: nay, but let the shadow <S%H6738><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> backward <S%H322><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> degrees <S%H4609><s%>.

And Yesha`yah-yahu <S%H3470><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> cried <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>: and he brought <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the shadow <S%H6738><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> degrees <S%H4609><s%> backward <S%H322><s%>, by <S%H4609><s%> which it had gone down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the dial <S%H4609><s%> of Ahaz <S%H271><s%>.

At that time <S%H6256><s%> Berodachbaladan <S%H1255><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Baladan <S%H1081><s%>, king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> letters <S%H5612><s%> and a present <S%H4503><s%> unto Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%>: for he had heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%> had been sick <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, and shewed <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them all the house <S%H1004><s%> of his precious things <S%H5238><s%>, the silver <S%H3701><s%>, and the gold <S%H2091><s%>, and the spices <S%H1314><s%>, and the precious <S%H2896><s%> ointment <S%H8081><s%>, and all the house <S%H1004><s%> of his armour <S%H3627><s%>, and all that was found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8738><s%> in his treasures <S%H214><s%>: there was nothing <S%H1697><s%> in his house <S%H1004><s%>, nor in all his dominion <S%H4475><s%>, that Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%> shewed <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them not.

Then came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yesha`yah-yahu <S%H3470><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> unto king <S%H4428><s%> Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, What said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> these men <S%H582><s%>? and from whence <S%H370><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> they unto thee? And Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, They are come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from a far <S%H7350><s%> country <S%H776><s%>, even from Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, What have they seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in thine house <S%H1004><s%>? And Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, All the things that are in mine house <S%H1004><s%> have they seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: there is nothing <S%H1697><s%> among my treasures <S%H214><s%> that I have not shewed <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them.
And Yesha`yah-yahu <S%H3470><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Is it not good, if peace <S%H7965><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> be in my days <S%H3117><s%> ?

And Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%> slept <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with his fathers <S%H1><s%>: and M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in his stead.
